name: 1paint.GitHub.io
body:
My GitHub: [https://github.com/1Paint](https://github.com/1Paint)
[get_chat_history](https://github.com/1Paint/GroupMe-Chat-History)
======= **'get_chat_history'** is an application that communicates with [GroupMe's API](https://dev.groupme.com/) and can retrieve and download the chat histories of a GroupMe user given that user's GroupMe Access Token. ### Application ### Output
[LoL Champions](https://github.com/1Paint/LoL-Champions)
======= A web app displaying League of Legends champion stats and abilities. Currently hosted at [https://sleepy-cliffs-16895.herokuapp.com/](https://sleepy-cliffs-16895.herokuapp.com/) Features ------- * Dynamic retrieval, processing, and formatting of champions and their stats from Riot Game's latest API. * Homepage of champions filterable by role. * A 'Compare' page allowing users to view champions between different game versions. * An index page of champions filterable by role and a table of sortable stats—from general stats to level 1 and level 18 stats. * Data on number of missing/misplaced API data for all champions' abilities. * Responsive and aesthetic layouts for desktop and mobile views. Desktop & Mobile/Tablet Previews ------- ### Homepage   ### Champion Stats   ### Champion Abilities   ### Champion Index with Sortable Stats   ### Comparisons Page - Stats (Lucian 6.9.1 vs Jhin 6.9.1) ### Comparisons Page - Stats (Gragas 6.9.1 vs Gragas 3.8.5) ### Comparisons Page - Abilities (Gragas 6.9.1 vs Gragas 3.8.5)
[Wind Turbine Analysis](https://github.com/1Paint/Wind-Turbine-Analysis)
======= Wind Turbine Analysis is an application that calculates the mechanical forces experienced by a wind turbine, as detailed [here](https://github.com/1Paint/Wind-Turbine-Analysis/blob/master/documentation/tubine_details.pdf). From these calculations, the application is able to determine if the wind turbine meets specified safety requirements. ### Main and Edit Windows ### Menu Tabs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
